author: lundblad
msg: On the nonxml-entries branch: Support upgrading from older WC formats.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/entries.c (svn_wc__entries_write): Always
write the *current* WC format number of the library.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/lock.c
(maybe_upgrade_format): Use the same procedure when upgrading from format
6 to 7 as we use for upgrading older formats.
* TODO: Remove done entry.

author: lundblad
msg: On the nonxml-entries branch: Follow-up to r19299 with a stupid fix and minor
clarification.
Suggested by: malcolm
Jonathan Gilbert <o2w9gs702@sneakemail.com>
* subversion/libsvn_wc/README
(The entries file): Don't try to redefine the meaning of "ASCII control
character".  Clarify that NULs are not allowed.

author: lundblad
msg: On the nonxml-entries branch: Follow-up to r19299 with minor clarifications
to the WC format specification.
Suggested by: malcolm
* subversion/libsvn_wc/README (`entries'): Reintroduce the paragraph about how
to ensure a WC is ready for use, which was removed from the section
about the format file.
(The entries file): Move character encoding sentence to the beginning of the
section.  Clarify how lines are separated.  Clarify syntax of
escaping mechanism.

author: adejong
msg: Import release 0.7 of svn2cl. This version includes performance
enhancements, a couple of new options, auto-detection of repository
working directory (when using svn>=1.3.0) and some general
improvements.
[in contrib/client-side/svn2cl]
* svn2cl.sh: The command line options --separate-daylogs and
--reparagraph were added.  svn info is now used to get the path to
strip from svn log and support detecting and reading colon separated
authors files was added.
* svn2html.xsl: Performance improvements were made by only doing
author/date comparisons if --group-by-day was specified.  The
revision numbers are now linkable.
* svn2html.css: Small layout improvements were made.
* svn2cl.1: The new options and features were documented.
* svn2cl.xsl: Performance improvements were made by only doing
author/date comparisons if --group-by-day was specified.  The author
lookup code was tuned a bit and the new command-line options were
implemented.

author: lundblad
msg: * TODO: Remove done entry.
